title: 112_hr2773
content: Establishment of units of the National Guard in the Commonwealth of the Northern Mariana Islands. Title 32 (National Guard) Amendments include changes to definitions, branches, organizations, and units in Puerto Rico and the Commonwealth of the Northern Mariana Islands. Amendments to Title 32 include changes to include the Commonwealth of the Northern Mariana Islands in various subsections related to appropriations, maintenance of troops, and drug interdiction activities. Amendments to Title 32 now include the Commonwealth of the Northern Mariana Islands in various sections related to drug interdiction, enlistment oath, adjutants general, regular member details, and termination of appointment. Amendments to Title 32 now include the Commonwealth of the Northern Mariana Islands in various sections related to national guard duty, composition of courts-martial, convening authority of courts-martial, and governor's authority. Amendments to Title 32 now include the Commonwealth of the Northern Mariana Islands in various sections related to national guard duty, composition of courts-martial, convening authority of courts-martial, governor's authority, training operations, training missions, field exercises, and national guard schools. Amendments to Title 32 now include the Commonwealth of the Northern Mariana Islands in various sections related to national guard duty, composition of courts-martial, convening authority of courts-martial, governor's authority, training operations, training missions, field exercises, national guard schools, small arms competitions, attendance at army and air force schools, national guard youth challenge program, and issue of supplies. Amendments to Title 32 now include the Commonwealth of the Northern Mariana Islands in various sections related to national guard duty, courts-martial, governor's authority, training operations, small arms competitions, and issue of supplies. Amendments to Title 32 now include the Commonwealth of the Northern Mariana Islands in sections related to technicians' employment, property accountability, disposition of property, and settlements for loss or injury. Amendments to Title 32 now include the Commonwealth of the Northern Mariana Islands in sections related to settlements for property loss, personal injury, or death, and homeland defense activities. In Title 10, definitions are amended to include the Commonwealth of Puerto Rico and the Commonwealth of the Northern Mariana Islands. Amendments to Title 32 and Title 10 include the Commonwealth of the Northern Mariana Islands in various sections, such as militia duty exemptions, articles of uniform, and details of army and air national guard duties. Amendments include adding the Commonwealth of the Northern Mariana Islands to various sections of Title 32 and Title 10, such as militia duty exemptions, army and air national guard details, and definitions of state for division e. Amendments to Title 32 and Title 10 include adding the Commonwealth of the Northern Mariana Islands to various sections, such as reserve components, commissioned officers, and facilities for reserve components. Amendments to Title 32 and Title 10 include adding the Commonwealth of the Northern Mariana Islands to various sections, such as reserve components, commissioned officers, and facilities.
